author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess.

newsMedieval:
In a world where chaos doth reign and cyberspace forestall,
Evolution Equity Partners, fierce warriors of the digital sprawl.
They forge a path through morass deep, to find cybersecurity keep,
To guard against the hackers' creep, and safe our secrets keep.

Upon a land of Southern clime, where sand and sun aplenty,
Retirees, hopeful to escape the price of fair Florid' sea,
Migrate they must to Baldwin's shores, in Alabama's embrace,
For there they find what they adore, and ease their twilight's race.

Lo, far across the sea doth rise the Chinese venture story,
Hong Kong did turn its hopeful gaze upon a liquor glory,
But woe unto their pallid fate, for in their debut trading,
The promises did fizzle out, and hope proved unforgiving.

feedItems.title: Evolution Equity Partners Builds on Cybersecurity Opportunities
feedItems.description: The specialist startup investor expects unsettled markets to spur more digital attacks, driving demand for protection against hacks and hackers.

feedItems.title: Priced Out of Florida, More Retirees Are Trying This Sunbelt State on For Size
feedItems.description: Seniors are finding that Alabama’s Baldwin County is not only more affordable, but has the same weather and same beaches that make its neighbor a popular retirement destination.

feedItems.title: Chinese Liquor Maker Sinks After Serving Up Hong Kong's Biggest IPO in Months
feedItems.description: Hong Kong’s biggest listing so far this year flopped in its trading debut, a troubling sign for a market that has been trying to recover from a long IPO slump.

author.name: Conchobar mac Nessa
author.description: An Irish bard who doth sing of the battles and triumphs of his people, preserving their traditions and history.

newsMedieval:
In Barclays and Deutsche Bank, we see,
Strength in results, rehabilitating,
European lenders, cautious be,
Investors wary, anticipating.

Where GoTo Gojek Tokopedia fair,
Didst narrow losses in the first quarter,
With cost-saving measures in their care,
Reducing burdens, till gains did dare.

Then, lo, the Eurozone sentiment,
Of economic hope it didst rise,
From ninety-nine, to pain relent,
Yet still below forecast, and wise.

feedItems.title: The Next Companies to Splash the Cash? European Banks---Really
feedItems.description: Strong first-quarter results from Barclays and Deutsche Bank show the financial rehabilitation of Europe’s top lenders, but investors remain wary.

feedItems.title: GoTo Gojek Tokopedia Narrowed Net Loss Amid Cost-Saving Measures
feedItems.description: GoTo Gojek Tokopedia narrowed its net loss in the first quarter as cost-saving measures helped reduce operating costs.

feedItems.title: Eurozone Economic Sentiment Ticks Up Only Slightly
feedItems.description: The eurozone’s economic sentiment indicator rose to 99.3 April, from a downwardly revised 99.2 in March, and below forecast, suggesting slowing momentum of an economic revival in the bloc as cost-of-living pressures weigh.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A troubadour from Occitania who doth compose songs of love and chivalry, enchanting all who hear her voice.

newsMedieval:
In realms of coin and fiscal tide,
A fall in dollar doth reside,
If pause in rate-rise doth declare,
At meeting May, with banks in snare.

With earnings rose and quarters fair,
Hold STMicro in thy care,
In revenue, their guidance shows,
The year ahead, what fate bestows.

Of debt and ceiling, questions rise,
And in the Congress, compromise,
Shall pass new laws with purpose vast,
The U.S. debts be not surpassed.

feedItems.title: Dollar Could Fall Further if Fed Signals Pause in Rate-Rise Cycle
feedItems.description: The dollar could extend its losses as the Fed could signal a pause in its interest-rate rise cycle at its May 3 meeting amid fresh concerns over U.S. regional banks, MUFG Bank said.

feedItems.title: STMicroelectronics First-Quarter Earnings Rose
feedItems.description: STMicroelectronics reported higher earnings for the first quarter and released revenue guidance for the second quarter and full year.

feedItems.title: What Is the Debt Ceiling and How Does It Work?
feedItems.description: The U.S. risks failure to pay its debts if Congress doesn’t pass new legislation.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous and satirical, might contain references to wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of Russian rockets, harm's own rain,
In Southern Ukraine, they dost pain.
Mykolaiv, where peace once played,
Now wounded by the Eastern raid.

Mounjaro's touch dost heal the ill,
For diabetes patients' will.
Their weight dost part with grim defeat,
Up to fifteen percent retreat.

Of memory's chips, a wee bit small,
Yet makers sing, recovery's call.
Samsung predicts a brighter day,
Inventions near, take gloom away.

feedItems.title: Russian Rockets Batter Residential Area in Southern Ukraine
feedItems.description: A Russian rocket barrage left at least one person dead and almost two dozen injured in the southern Ukrainian city of Mykolaiv after months of relative calm there, as Russian forces continued to push to capture the city of Bakhmut in the east.

feedItems.title: Mounjaro Helps Diabetes Patients Lose 'Meaningful' Weight, Study Shows
feedItems.description: Participants with Type 2 diabetes who were also overweight or obese lost up to 15.7% of body weight

feedItems.title: Memory-Chip Makers Say Recovery Is in Sight After Long Slump
feedItems.description: Samsung expressed optimism that customers will start buying again as their inventories are now depleted and manufacturers are preparing for launches of new smartphones and PCs later this year.
